Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. John the Baptist or the Feast of the Theophany:

Text.Language: Hiten nip~recbia n~te pip~rodromoc m~bapt/ctic: Iwann/c piref]wmc: P[oic a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the intercessions of the forerunner and baptizer, John the Baptist, O Lord, grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
بشفاعات السابق الصابغ يوحنا المعمدان ، ياربُ أنعم علينا بمغفرة خطايانا.
